Offer Origin.description: The type of company that originated the offers. Dealer: The piece was sent from a business that sells new and/or used vehicles to consumers. Manufacturer: The piece was sent from a business that is responsible for manufacturing, importing and/or distributing cars. Service Center: The piece was sent from a business that performs the repairs and/or maintenance on vehicles;

Vehicle Brand.description: The manufacturer of the vehicles listed, including (but not limited to): Ford, Chevrolet, Honda, Hyundai, Tesla, Nissan, Toyota, Kia.

Vehicle Representation.description: If multiple vehicles are mentioned, set to Division Line-Up.

Warranty.description: If there is a warranty being offered, how many miles and years. If there are multiple, list only the longest.

Vehicle Launch.description: Whether the piece contains information about a newly revised vehicle or a totally new car which has been added to the manufacturerâ€™s line-up. Only a Manufacturer can launch a vehicle.

Vehicle.description: Details about each vehicle listed in the text
